summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: On-market buy-back  
- **Total Shares Bought Back**: 89,937,912 ordinary shares (out of max 155,352,495 authorized, ~10% of outstanding)  
- **Total Consideration Paid**: AUD 734,565.38  
- **Price Range**: AUD 0.007 (low, paid 21/7/2025) to AUD 0.009 (high, paid 8/5/2024)  
- **Buy-back Period**: 25/7/2023 to 24/7/2025 (now completed)  
- **No shareholder approval required**  

*No further material details identified.*
